content: Le strade principali di molti villaggi sono state in effetti abbandonate. La ragione principale Ã¨ l'avanzare di grandi supermercati come Wal-Mart.
translations: eng:The main streets of many villages have in fact been abandoned. The main reason is the advance of big stores like Wal-Mar
